short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides spoilers in Disney+ including titles, descriptions, cover art and thumbnails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Disclaimer:

Disney+ is a trademark of The Walt Disney Company. This application and its developer are in no way affiliated with The Walt Disney Company.

The following types of spoilers can be optionally blocked from showing on Disney+:

- Episode titles and descriptions
- Movie, show, extras, trailer and episode thumbnails
- Movie and show synopses
- Banner art
- Background images

Tip: Hold CTRL to show blocked images
